sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Boeing topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 53.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble, trading flat on the day.
Procter & Gamble is showing a gain of 10.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon Communications, trading flat on the day, and Caterpillar, trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
